title: M Code Fanuc i-series Lathe Reference
description: M-Code Listing for Fanuc i-series Controls

M00.desc: Operation holds temporarily under the state of the cycle start switch.

M01.desc: Operation stops temporarily (hold) under the state of the optional stop switch.

M03.desc: Turns spindle on in forward rotation, accompany with a S-code and a P-code.

M04.desc: Turns spindle on in reverse rotation, accompany with a S-code and a P-code.

M05.desc: Stops specified spindle with accompanying P-code

M29.desc: Accompany with S-code, in order to command new speed and spindle of the control path P-code mst be commanded.

M31.desc: While main chuck is rotating, chuck, tailstock, and steady rest commands become effective.

M34.desc: This function can be used as the method to change C1-Axis (cs contouring mode) to main spindle status (spindle speed control mode).

M35.desc: This function can be used as the method to change main spindle status (spindle speed control mode) to C1-Axis (cs contouring mode).

M54.desc: Count the quantity of the workpiece that has finished machining and display the quantity in CRT

M86.desc: This command can be used to skip by load capacity of servo motor at the time of axis moving.

M87.desc: This command can be used to cancel torque skip function.

M110.desc: Releases the function which checks the interference on each feeding axes.

M111.desc: Cancels the function of interference check release.

M131.desc: While sub spindle is rotating, sub chuck, tailstock, and steady rest commands become effective.

M134.desc: This function can be used as the method to change C2-Axis (cs contouring mode) to sub spindle status (Spindle speed control mode).

M135.desc: This function can be used as the method to change sub spindle status (spindle speed control mode) to C2-Axis (cs contouring mode).

M136.shortDesc: Synchronous Control On Between C1 and C2
M136.desc: It is possible to use that C1-Axis and C2-Axis rotate in synchronized same feed speed. In order to use this function, C1 and C2 must be returned to their origin position, and both chucks must be clamped.

M137.shortDesc: Synchronous Control Off Between C1 and C2

M203.desc: Main spindle and sub spindle rotate in CW direction with same r/min. In order to use this command, one out of main or sub chuck must be unclamped. M31 or M131 must be commanded before unclmaping.

P.shortDesc: Which chuck the command is for

M204.desc: Main spindle and sub spindle rotate in CCW direction with same r/min. In order to use this command, one out of main or sub chuck must be unclamped. M31 or M131 must be commanded before unclmaping.

P.shortDesc: Which chuck the command is for

M205.desc: Main spindle and sub spindle stop with same rpm and phase.

P.shortDesc: Which chuck the command is for

M213.desc: Main spindle and sub spindle rotate in CW direction with same r/min and phase. In order to use command, one out of main or sub chuck must be unclamped. M31 or M131 must be commanded before unclamping.

P.shortDesc: Which chuck the command is for

M214.desc: Main spindle and sub spindle rotate in CCW direction with same r/min and phase. In order to use command, one out of main or sub chuck must be unclamped. M31 or M131 must be commanded before unclamping.

P.shortDesc: Which chuck the command is for
